Nagata, N. ( 2020). Gold nanoparticle‐adjuvanted S protein induces a strong antigen‐specific IgG response against severe acute respiratory syndrome‐related coronavirus infection, but fails to induce protective antibodies and limit eosinophilic infiltration in lungs. Microbiology and Immunology, 64( 1), 33– 51. 10.1111/1348-0421.12754 31692019
